### [Flood Susceptibility AHP Tool](https://spatialgeography.projects.earthengine.app/view/floodsusceptibility)
**Status:** Live | **Type:** Web App
A web application to create Flood Susceptibility Maps for any Indian State or District using the Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP).

### [Phenology Signature Tool](https://spatialgeography.projects.earthengine.app/view/signature)
**Status:** Live | **Type:** Web App
A tool for monitoring crop phenology and analyzing spectral signatures over time.

### [Spectral Reflectance Curve](https://spatialgeography.projects.earthengine.app/view/signature)
**Status:** Live | **Type:** Web App
Generate accurate training samples by visualizing spectral signature curves for different land cover types.
